title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 26/97 of 9 January 1997 amending Regulation (EC) No 2190/96 as regards systems A1 and B for issuing export licences in the fruit and vegetables sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 26/97 of 9 January 1997 amending Regulation (EC) No 2190/96 as regards systems A1 and B for issuing export licences in the fruit and vegetables sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EC) No 2190/96 is hereby amended as follows:
1. The following is inserted after Article 5 (2):
'2a. The provisions of the first subparagraph of Article 20 (3) of Regulation (EEC) No 3665/87 shall apply to B licences. The destinations or groups of destinations shall be indicated in box 7 of licence applications and licences.`
2. Annexes I and IV are replaced by Annexes I and II respectively to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 10 January 1997.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 January 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 297, 21. 11. 1996, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 292, 15. 11. 1996, p. 12.
